FuncDef:
This command creates a text description stored in the configuration file for a configuration context.
This command associates a text string with a configuration context to help identify the context in the configuration file.

ParaDef.Info: The description character string. Allowed values are any string up to 80 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.

ExtraInfo: Default: No description associated with the configuration context.
